text: Ifavarir gumaziba atiatia kamaghɨn nɨghnɨsi, “Gumazir igharaziba kamaghɨn fogh suam, e nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Kraisɨn ter ighuvimɨn iti, egh me pazɨv e damuam.” Kamaghɨn amizɨma me ian mɨkarzir mogomeba aghorasa bar gavgafi. Me ghaze, me ian mɨkarzir mogomeba aghorasa, me damightɨma, me ian mɨkarzir mogomeba aghorezir bizir kam bagh men ziaba fam. Ezɨ gumazir uan mɨkarziba aghorezir kabanagh, me uaghan deravɨra Moses Osirizir Arazibar gɨn zuir puvatɨ. Ia oragh. Gumazir kaba ian mɨkarzir mogomeba aghorasa bar gavgafi. Me kamagh sua, me kamaghɨn ia damigh gumazir igharazibar damazimɨn ziar ekiaba iniasa.
